item.title: Launch Help
item.description: Launch help from the workbench menu: Help->Help Contents. This should open the help view to the main bookshelf that lists the available books.

item.title: Open First Book
item.description: In the Contents page click on the plus sign next to the Workbench User Guide book. This should expand that book and show it contents. All the other books must still be available in the navigation frame (i.e. only the select book expands).

item.title: Open topic
item.description: In the table of contents tree navigate to Concepts ->Workbench. Selecting the "Workbench" topic should show some content in the main help area.

item.title: Follow link
item.description: Click on the "Installing new software" link in the displayed document. This should load a new document.
